alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 10:00PM CDT until August 25 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Vermilion County in east central Illinois... Central Champaign County in east central Illinois... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Champaign, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Savoy and Thomasboro around 1005 PM CDT. Urbana around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include St. Joseph, Sidney, Ogden, Homer, Oakwood, Fairmount, Fithian and Muncie. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 231 and 247. Interstate 72 between mile markers 176 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 172 and 206. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
